1: הַדָּבָ֛ר <sup>1697 </sup> <n>The word</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> הָיָ֥ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>came</n> אֶֽל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> יִרְמְיָ֖הוּ <sup>3414 </sup> <n>which came unto Jeremiah</n> מֵאֵ֣ת <sup>853 </sup> יְהוָ֑ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>from the LORD</n> וּנְבוּכַדְרֶאצַּ֣ר <sup>5019 </sup> <n>when Nebuchadnezzar</n> מֶֽלֶךְ־ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>king</n> בָּבֶ֣ל ׀ <sup>894 </sup> <n>of Babylon</n> וְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> חֵיל֡וֹ <sup>2428 </sup> <n>and all his army</n> וְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> מַמְלְכ֣וֹת <sup>4467 </sup> <n>and all the kingdoms</n> אֶרֶץ֩ <sup>776 </sup> <n>of the earth</n> מֶמְשֶׁ֨לֶת <sup>4475 </sup> <n>his dominion</n> יָד֜וֹ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>able</n> וְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> הָעַמִּ֗ים <sup>5971 </sup> <n>and all the people</n> נִלְחָמִ֧ים <sup>3898 </sup> <n>fought</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> יְרוּשָׁלִַ֛ם <sup>3389 </sup> <n>against Jerusalem</n> וְעַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and against</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> עָרֶ֖יהָ <sup>5892 </sup> <n>and against all the cities</n> לֵאמֹֽר׃ <sup>559 </sup> <n>thereof saying</n>
2: כֹּֽה־ <sup>3541 </sup> <n>Thus</n> אָמַ֤ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>Thus saith</n> יְהוָה֙ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֵ֣י <sup>430 </sup> <n>the God</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> הָלֹךְ֙ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>Go</n> וְאָ֣מַרְתָּ֔ <sup>559 </sup> <n>and speak</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> צִדְקִיָּ֖הוּ <sup>6667 </sup> <n>to Zedekiah</n> מֶ֣לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>king</n> יְהוּדָ֑ה <sup>3063 </sup> <n>of Judah</n> וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <sup>559 </sup> <n>and tell</n> אֵלָ֗יו <sup>413 </sup> <n>to him</n> כֹּ֚ה <sup>3541 </sup> <n>Thus</n> אָמַ֣ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>him Thus saith</n> יְהוָ֔ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> הִנְנִ֨י <sup>2005 </sup> <n>behold</n> נֹתֵ֜ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>Behold I will give</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הָעִ֤יר <sup>5892 </sup> <n>this city</n> הַזֹּאת֙ <sup>2063 </sup> <n>into</n> בְּיַ֣ד <sup>3027 </sup> <n>into the hand</n> מֶֽלֶךְ־ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>of the king</n> בָּבֶ֔ל <sup>894 </sup> <n>of Babylon</n> וּשְׂרָפָ֖הּ <sup>8313 </sup> <n>and he shall burn</n> בָּאֵֽשׁ׃ <sup>784 </sup> <n>it with fire</n>
3: וְאַתָּ֗ה <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> לֹ֚א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>You will not</n> תִמָּלֵט֙ <sup>4422 </sup> <n>And thou shalt not escape out</n> מִיָּד֔וֹ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>of his hand</n> כִּ֚י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> תָּפֹ֣שׂ <sup>8610 </sup> <n>but shalt surely</n> תִּתָּפֵ֔שׂ <sup>8610 </sup> <n>be taken</n> וּבְיָד֖וֹ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>into his hand</n> תִּנָּתֵ֑ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>and delivered</n> וְֽ֠עֵינֶיךָ <sup>5869 </sup> <n>and thine eyes</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> עֵינֵ֨י <sup>5869 </sup> <n>the eyes</n> מֶֽלֶךְ־ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>of the king</n> בָּבֶ֜ל <sup>894 </sup> <n>of Babylon</n> תִּרְאֶ֗ינָה <sup>7200 </sup> <n>shall behold</n> וּפִ֛יהוּ <sup>6310 </sup> <n>with thee mouth</n> אֶת־ <sup>854 </sup> <n>for</n> פִּ֥יךָ <sup>6310 </sup> <n>to mouth</n> יְדַבֵּ֖ר <sup>1696 </sup> <n>and he shall speak</n> וּבָבֶ֥ל <sup>894 </sup> <n>to Babylon</n> תָּבֽוֹא׃ <sup>935 </sup> <n>and thou shalt go</n>
4: אַ֚ךְ <sup>389 </sup> <n>Yet</n> שְׁמַ֣ע <sup>8085 </sup> <n>Yet hear</n> דְּבַר־ <sup>1697 </sup> <n>the word</n> יְהוָ֔ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> צִדְקִיָּ֖הוּ <sup>6667 </sup> <n>O Zedekiah</n> מֶ֣לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>king</n> יְהוּדָ֑ה <sup>3063 </sup> <n>of Judah</n> כֹּֽה־ <sup>3541 </sup> <n>Thus</n> אָמַ֤ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>Thus saith</n> יְהוָה֙ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> עָלֶ֔יךָ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>concerning</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>You will not</n> תָמ֖וּת <sup>4191 </sup> <n>of thee Thou shalt not die</n> בֶּחָֽרֶב׃ <sup>2719 </sup> <n>by the sword</n>
5: בְּשָׁל֣וֹם <sup>7965 </sup> <n>in peace</n> תָּמ֗וּת <sup>4191 </sup> <n>[But] thou shalt die</n> וּֽכְמִשְׂרְפ֣וֹת <sup>4955 </sup> <n>and with the burnings</n> אֲ֠בוֹתֶיךָ <sup>1 </sup> <n>of thy fathers</n> הַמְּלָכִ֨ים <sup>4428 </sup> <n>kings</n> הָרִֽאשֹׁנִ֜ים <sup>7223 </sup> <n>the former</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> הָי֣וּ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> לְפָנֶ֗יךָ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>which were before</n> כֵּ֚ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>so</n> יִשְׂרְפוּ־ <sup>8313 </sup> <n>thee so shall they burn</n> לָ֔ךְ וְה֥וֹי <sup>1945 </sup> <n>thee [saying] Ah</n> אָד֖וֹן <sup>113 </sup> <n>lord</n> יִסְפְּדוּ־ <sup>5594 </sup> <n>[odours] for thee and they will lament</n> לָ֑ךְ כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> דָבָ֥ר <sup>1697 </sup> <n>the word</n> אֲנִֽי־ <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> דִבַּ֖רְתִּי <sup>1696 </sup> <n>for I have pronounced</n> נְאֻם־ <sup>5002 </sup> <n>saith</n> יְהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> ס
6: וַיְדַבֵּר֙ <sup>1696 </sup> <n>spake</n> יִרְמְיָ֣הוּ <sup>3414 </sup> <n>Then Jeremiah</n> הַנָּבִ֔יא <sup>5030 </sup> <n>the prophet</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> צִדְקִיָּ֖הוּ <sup>6667 </sup> <n>unto Zedekiah</n> מֶ֣לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>king</n> יְהוּדָ֑ה <sup>3063 </sup> <n>of Judah</n> אֵ֛ת <sup>853 </sup> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> הַדְּבָרִ֥ים <sup>1697 </sup> <n>all these words</n> הָאֵ֖לֶּה <sup>428 </sup> <n>these</n> בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <sup>3389 </sup> <n>in Jerusalem</n>
7: וְחֵ֣יל <sup>2428 </sup> <n>army</n> מֶֽלֶךְ־ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>When the king</n> בָּבֶ֗ל <sup>894 </sup> <n>of Babylon's</n> נִלְחָמִים֙ <sup>3898 </sup> <n>fought</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> יְר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <sup>3389 </sup> <n>against Jerusalem</n> וְעַ֛ל <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and against</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> עָרֵ֥י <sup>5892 </sup> <n>and against all the cities</n> יְהוּדָ֖ה <sup>3063 </sup> <n>of Judah</n> הַנּֽוֹתָר֑וֹת <sup>3498 </sup> <n>that were left</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> לָכִישׁ֙ <sup>3923 </sup> <n>against Lachish</n> וְאֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>and</n> עֲזֵקָ֔ה <sup>5825 </sup> <n>and against Azekah</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> הֵ֗נָּה <sup>2007 </sup> <n>in</n> נִשְׁאֲר֛וּ <sup>7604 </sup> <n>remained</n> בְּעָרֵ֥י <sup>5892 </sup> <n>cities</n> יְהוּדָ֖ה <sup>3063 </sup> <n>of Judah</n> עָרֵ֥י <sup>5892 </sup> <n>of the cities</n> מִבְצָֽר׃ <sup>4013 </sup> <n>for these defenced</n> פ
8: הַדָּבָ֛ר <sup>1697 </sup> <n>[This is] the word</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> הָיָ֥ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>came</n> אֶֽל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> יִרְמְיָ֖הוּ <sup>3414 </sup> <n>that came unto Jeremiah</n> מֵאֵ֣ת <sup>853 </sup> יְהוָ֑ה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>God</n> אַחֲרֵ֡י <sup>310 </sup> <n>after</n> כְּרֹת֩ <sup>3772 </sup> <n>had made</n> הַמֶּ֨לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>that the king</n> צִדְקִיָּ֜הוּ <sup>6667 </sup> <n>Zedekiah</n> בְּרִ֗ית <sup>1285 </sup> <n>a covenant</n> אֶת־ <sup>854 </sup> <n>with</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> הָעָם֙ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>with all the people</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> בִּירֽוּשָׁלִַ֔ם <sup>3389 </sup> <n>which [were] at Jerusalem</n> לִקְרֹ֥א <sup>7121 </sup> <n>to proclaim</n> לָהֶ֖ם <sup>1992 </sup> <n>like</n> דְּרֽוֹר׃ <sup>1865 </sup> <n>liberty</n>
9: לְ֠שַׁלַּח <sup>7971 </sup> <n>go</n> אִ֣ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>That every man</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> עַבְדּ֞וֹ <sup>5650 </sup> <n>should let his manservant</n> וְאִ֧ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>and every man</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> שִׁפְחָת֛וֹ <sup>8198 </sup> <n>his maidservant</n> הָעִבְרִ֥י <sup>5680 </sup> <n>[being] an Hebrew</n> וְהָעִבְרִיָּ֖ה <sup>5680 </sup> <n>or an Hebrewess</n> חָפְשִׁ֑ים <sup>2670 </sup> <n>free</n> לְבִלְתִּ֧י <sup>1115 </sup> <n>no</n> עֲבָד־ <sup>5647 </sup> <n>that none should serve</n> בָּ֛ם בִּיהוּדִ֥י <sup>3064 </sup> <n>himself of them [to wit] of a Jew</n> אָחִ֖יהוּ <sup>251 </sup> <n>his brother</n> אִֽישׁ׃ <sup>376 </sup> <n>and each</n>
10: וַיִּשְׁמְעוּ֩ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>heard</n> כָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> הַשָּׂרִ֨ים <sup>8269 </sup> <n>Now when all the princes</n> וְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> הָעָ֜ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>and all the people</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> בָּ֣אוּ <sup>935 </sup> <n>which had entered</n> בַבְּרִ֗ית <sup>1285 </sup> <n>into the covenant</n> לְ֠שַׁלַּח <sup>7971 </sup> <n>go</n> אִ֣ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>that every one</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> עַבְדּ֞וֹ <sup>5650 </sup> <n>should let his manservant</n> וְאִ֤ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>and every one</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> שִׁפְחָתוֹ֙ <sup>8198 </sup> <n>his maidservant</n> חָפְשִׁ֔ים <sup>2670 </sup> <n>free</n> לְבִלְתִּ֥י <sup>1115 </sup> <n>no</n> עֲבָד־ <sup>5647 </sup> <n>that none should serve</n> בָּ֖ם ע֑וֹד <sup>5750 </sup> <n>any</n> וַֽיִּשְׁמְע֖וּ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>themselves of them any more then they obeyed</n> וַיְשַׁלֵּֽחוּ׃ <sup>7971 </sup> <n>and let [them] go</n>
11: וַיָּשׁ֙וּבוּ֙ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>they turned</n> אַחֲרֵי־ <sup>310 </sup> <n>But afterward</n> כֵ֔ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>after that</n> וַיָּשִׁ֗בוּ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>to return</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הָֽעֲבָדִים֙ <sup>5650 </sup> <n>and caused the servants</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַשְּׁפָח֔וֹת <sup>8198 </sup> <n>and the handmaids</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>whom</n> שִׁלְּח֖וּ <sup>7971 </sup> <n>whom they had let go</n> חָפְשִׁ֑ים <sup>2670 </sup> <n>free</n> [וַיַּכְבִּישׁוּם כ] (וַֽיִּכְבְּשׁ֔וּם <sup>3533 </sup> <n>bring into bondage</n> ק) לַעֲבָדִ֖ים <sup>5650 </sup> <n>for servants</n> וְלִשְׁפָחֽוֹת׃ <sup>8198 </sup> <n>and for handmaids</n> ס

13: כֹּֽה־ <sup>3541 </sup> <n>Thus</n> אָמַ֥ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>Thus saith</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֵ֣י <sup>430 </sup> <n>the God</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> אָנֹכִ֗י <sup>595 </sup> <n>I</n> כָּרַ֤תִּֽי <sup>3772 </sup> <n>I made</n> בְרִית֙ <sup>1285 </sup> <n>a covenant</n> אֶת־ <sup>854 </sup> <n>with</n> אֲב֣וֹתֵיכֶ֔ם <sup>1 </sup> <n>with your fathers</n> בְּי֨וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>in the day</n> הוֹצִאִ֤י <sup>3318 </sup> <n>that I brought them forth</n> אוֹתָם֙ <sup>853 </sup> מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>out of the land</n> מִצְרַ֔יִם <sup>4714 </sup> <n>of Egypt</n> מִבֵּ֥ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>out of the house</n> עֲבָדִ֖ים <sup>5650 </sup> <n>of bondmen</n> לֵאמֹֽר׃ <sup>559 </sup> <n>saying</n>
14: מִקֵּ֣ץ <sup>7093 </sup> <n>At the end</n> שֶׁ֣בַע <sup>7651 </sup> <n>of seven</n> שָׁנִ֡ים <sup>8141 </sup> <n>years</n> תְּֽשַׁלְּח֡וּ <sup>7971 </sup> <n>let ye go</n> אִישׁ֩ <sup>376 </sup> <n>every man</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אָחִ֨יו <sup>251 </sup> <n>his brother</n> הָעִבְרִ֜י <sup>5680 </sup> <n>an Hebrew</n> אֲשֶֽׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> יִמָּכֵ֣ר <sup>4376 </sup> <n>which hath been sold</n> לְךָ֗ וַעֲבָֽדְךָ֙ <sup>5647 </sup> <n>unto thee and when he hath served</n> שֵׁ֣שׁ <sup>8337 </sup> <n>thee six</n> שָׁנִ֔ים <sup>8141 </sup> <n>years</n> וְשִׁלַּחְתּ֥וֹ <sup>7971 </sup> <n>thou shalt let him go</n> חָפְשִׁ֖י <sup>2670 </sup> <n>free</n> מֵֽעִמָּ֑ךְ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> וְלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>did not</n> שָׁמְע֤וּ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>hearkened</n> אֲבֽוֹתֵיכֶם֙ <sup>1 </sup> <n>from thee but your fathers</n> אֵלַ֔י <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>or</n> הִטּ֖וּ <sup>5186 </sup> <n>not unto me neither inclined</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אָזְנָֽם׃ <sup>241 </sup> <n>their ear</n>
15: וַתָּשֻׁ֨בוּ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>turned</n> אַתֶּ֜ם <sup>859 </sup> <n>Although</n> הַיּ֗וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>And ye were now</n> וַתַּעֲשׂ֤וּ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>and had done</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַיָּשָׁר֙ <sup>3477 </sup> <n>right</n> בְּעֵינַ֔י <sup>5869 </sup> <n>in my sight</n> לִקְרֹ֥א <sup>7121 </sup> <n>in proclaiming</n> דְר֖וֹר <sup>1865 </sup> <n>liberty</n> אִ֣ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>every man</n> לְרֵעֵ֑הוּ <sup>7453 </sup> <n>to his neighbour</n> וַתִּכְרְת֤וּ <sup>3772 </sup> <n>and ye had made</n> בְרִית֙ <sup>1285 </sup> <n>a covenant</n> לְפָנַ֔י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> בַּבַּ֕יִת <sup>1004 </sup> <n>me in the house</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> נִקְרָ֥א <sup>7121 </sup> <n>which is called</n> שְׁמִ֖י <sup>8034 </sup> <n>by my name</n> עָלָֽיו׃ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n>
16: וַתָּשֻׁ֙בוּ֙ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>But ye turned</n> וַתְּחַלְּל֣וּ <sup>2490 </sup> <n>and polluted</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> שְׁמִ֔י <sup>8034 </sup> <n>my name</n> וַתָּשִׁ֗בוּ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>to return</n> אִ֤ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>and caused every man</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> עַבְדּוֹ֙ <sup>5650 </sup> <n>his servant</n> וְאִ֣ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>and every man</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> שִׁפְחָת֔וֹ <sup>8198 </sup> <n>his handmaid</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>whom</n> שִׁלַּחְתֶּ֥ם <sup>7971 </sup> <n>whom ye had set</n> חָפְשִׁ֖ים <sup>2670 </sup> <n>at liberty</n> לְנַפְשָׁ֑ם <sup>5315 </sup> <n>at their pleasure</n> וַתִּכְבְּשׁ֣וּ <sup>3533 </sup> <n>and brought them into subjection</n> אֹתָ֔ם <sup>853 </sup> לִֽהְי֣וֹת <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> לָכֶ֔ם לַעֲבָדִ֖ים <sup>5650 </sup> <n>to be unto you for servants</n> וְלִשְׁפָחֽוֹת׃ <sup>8198 </sup> <n>and for handmaids</n> ס
17: לָכֵן֮ <sup>3651 </sup> <n>Therefore</n> כֹּה־ <sup>3541 </sup> <n>thus</n> אָמַ֣ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>Therefore thus saith</n> יְהוָה֒ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> אַתֶּם֙ <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>have not</n> שְׁמַעְתֶּ֣ם <sup>8085 </sup> <n>Ye have not hearkened</n> אֵלַ֔י <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> לִקְרֹ֣א <sup>7121 </sup> <n>unto me in proclaiming</n> דְר֔וֹר <sup>1865 </sup> <n>liberty</n> אִ֥ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>every one</n> לְאָחִ֖יו <sup>251 </sup> <n>to his brother</n> וְאִ֣ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>and every man</n> לְרֵעֵ֑הוּ <sup>7453 </sup> <n>to his neighbour</n> הִנְנִ֣י <sup>2005 </sup> <n>behold</n> קֹרֵא֩ <sup>7121 </sup> <n>behold I proclaim</n> לָכֶ֨ם דְּר֜וֹר <sup>1865 </sup> <n>a liberty</n> נְאֻם־ <sup>5002 </sup> <n>for you saith</n> יְהוָ֗ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> הַחֶ֙רֶב֙ <sup>2719 </sup> <n>to the sword</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> הַדֶּ֣בֶר <sup>1698 </sup> <n>to the pestilence</n> וְאֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>and to</n> הָרָעָ֔ב <sup>7458 </sup> <n>and to the famine</n> וְנָתַתִּ֤י <sup>5414 </sup> <n>and I will make</n> אֶתְכֶם֙ <sup>853 </sup> [לִזְוָעָה כ] (לְזַעֲוָ֔ה <sup>2113 </sup> <n>be removed</n> ק) לְכֹ֖ל <sup>3605 </sup> <n>to all</n> מַמְלְכ֥וֹת <sup>4467 </sup> <n>into all the kingdoms</n> הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <sup>776 </sup> <n>of the earth</n>
18: וְנָתַתִּ֣י <sup>5414 </sup> <n>And I will give</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הָאֲנָשִׁ֗ים <sup>376 </sup> <n>the men</n> הָעֹֽבְרִים֙ <sup>5674 </sup> <n>that have transgressed</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> בְּרִתִ֔י <sup>1285 </sup> <n>my covenant</n> אֲשֶׁ֤ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>have not</n> הֵקִ֙ימוּ֙ <sup>6965 </sup> <n>which have not performed</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> דִּבְרֵ֣י <sup>1697 </sup> <n>the words</n> הַבְּרִ֔ית <sup>1285 </sup> <n>of the covenant</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> כָּרְת֖וּ <sup>3772 </sup> <n>which they had made</n> לְפָנָ֑י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> הָעֵ֙גֶל֙ <sup>5695 </sup> <n>the calf</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> כָּרְת֣וּ <sup>3772 </sup> <n>me when they cut</n> לִשְׁנַ֔יִם <sup>8147 </sup> <n>in twain</n> וַיַּעַבְר֖וּ <sup>5674 </sup> <n>and passed</n> בֵּ֥ין <sup>996 </sup> <n>between</n> בְּתָרָֽיו׃ <sup>1335 </sup> <n>between the parts</n>
